metadata.Name: Gazeta
metadata.Description: Gazeta is the first dataset for summarization of Russian news, collected from the Gazeta.ru news website. It contains over 63,000 article-summary pairs. The paper benchmarks several extractive and abstractive models on this dataset, demonstrating its validity for Russian text summarization tasks.
Provider: Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology
metadata.Paper Title: Dataset for Automatic Summarization of Russian News
metadata.Venue Title: Analysis of Images, Social Networks and Texts
Affiliations: Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology
metadata.Abstract: Automatic text summarization has been studied in a variety of domains and languages. However, this does not hold for the Russian language. To overcome this issue, we present Gazeta, the first dataset for summarization of Russian news. We describe the properties of this dataset and benchmark several extractive and abstractive models. We demonstrate that the dataset is a valid task for methods of text summarization for Russian. Additionally, we prove the pretrained mBART model to be useful for Russian text summarization.
